long_description: Designed to support your lower back during abdominal exercises, the GoFit Core Ab wedge is a versatile accessory you can use with virtually any core workout. Contoured design fits the curve of your back; firm cushioning offers comfortable support. Bottom gripper material anchors the GoFit Core Ab wedge.
short_description: Designed to support your lower back during abdominal exercises, the GoFit Core Ab wedge is a versatile accessory you can use with virtually any core workout.
